title: My City Walkabout
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Identity (Psychology)
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Group identity
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Group identity
abstract: An indigenous man's search for his identity. 'Screen It' 2013 Winner Secondary Live Action.
description: 'My City Walkabout' is a film with a French New Wave aesthetic that follows an Aboriginal man searching for his place in modern Australian society. Set in the man's dream, the film explores magic realism sequences to illustrate the protagonist's desire to alter his reality and ultimately find his identity.
